sentences.en: Because the boy engrave upon my memory.
sentences.cn: 因为那个男孩在我的记忆中留下深刻印象.

sentences.en: Engrave in the name on the board not definitely immortal.
sentences.cn: 刻在木板上的名字未必不朽.

sentences.en: From now on engrave! Forget it!
Harrods will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.cn: 哈罗兹还会将你孩子的名字刻在侧面。

sentences.en: He has heard the words and they engrave a memory.
sentences.cn: 不过话他还是听在耳里,留在记忆之中了.

sentences.en: In my heart I engrave your name that is ever there.
sentences.cn: 我只能在心中刻下你的名字.

sentences.en: It is difficult to engrave in marble.
sentences.cn: 在大理石上雕刻是困难的.

sentences.en: Make a plate of pure gold and engrave on it asa seal : HOLY TO THE LORD.
sentences.cn: 你要用精金作一面牌,在上面按刻图书之法刻着‘耶和华为圣’.

sentences.en: My heart will engrave the tear.
Only engrave if it is a special gift.
sentences.cn: 只有在表是一件有特殊意义的礼物时才在上面刻字.

sentences.en: Partly complementary engrave, makes work more perfectly.
sentences.cn: 局部补雕功能使工作更完美.

sentences.en: The jeweller will engrave the inside of the ring with her name.
sentences.cn: 珠宝匠将在戒指的内表面上刻上她的名字.

sentences.en: The laser engraving machine is widely used to engrave all kinds of non - metal products.
sentences.cn: 激光雕刻机用途十分广泛,可用于雕刻切割各种 非金属 制品.

sentences.en: The life starts to engrave ebullition ground to jump up there.
sentences.cn: 生命在那刻起沸腾地跳跃.

sentences.en: The shop will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.cn: 商店也将在一侧刻上你孩子的名字。

sentences.en: The then scene comes clearly to view, at any time with engrave to shock my heart.
sentences.cn: 当时的情景历历在目, 随时随刻震撼着我的心.

sentences.en: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost.
sentences.cn: 你的结婚戒指可以刻上个人题字不另收费。

words.tran_cn: 被牢记的；被深深印入的
在…上雕刻；给…深刻的印象（engrave的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 雕刻， 铭刻； 牢记， 铭记
trans.tran_en: If you engrave something with a design or words, or if you engrave a design or words on it, you cut the design or words into its surface

trans.tran_cn: （使）铭记，雕刻，镌刻，深印于（心上），印刷
trans.tran_en: to cut words or designs on metal, wood, glass etc
